ingredients.content: 1 lemon, thin peelings of skin only, no white pith
200 g feta cheese, cut in pieces (2 cm)
½ - 1 long red chilli, deseeded if preferred
¼ tsp fine sea salt, or to taste
1000 g rump steak, cut in pieces (2-3 cm)
240 g tinned kidney beans, rinsed and drained (1 x 400 g tin)
2 - 3 sprigs fresh coriander, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place lemon peelings in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then chop again <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.

Add all remaining ingredients and mix <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix for a further <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place onions, garlic and chilli in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil and all spices then sauté <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add salt, tomato purée, tomatoes, steak and sugar then cook <b>13 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add kidney beans and cook <b>2 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Serve beef topped with lemon feta and fresh coriander.
